title: Whipping Cane
content:
Whipping Cane Common 1~4 Damage 1d4 Bludgeoning Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A cane designed to inflict a sharp and agonising pain with every blow. Club Light 0.9 10

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

A cane designed to inflict a sharp and agonising pain with every blow.

Whipping Cane is one of the Club Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc). Characters need to master c
